In England, in the seven days to 26 June, there were 90,149 new confirmed cases (159.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 19 June, there were 57,225 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 58% (32,924 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 01 July is 4,196,833 (7,421.4 cases per 100,000 population).
